summary: This dispatch requests the photograph of "Comandante William" be shown to AMBINGOs for possible identification. Subject claimed to have received pilot training at San Antonio de los Banos Air Base and may have worked as a Cubana pilot under the name Ernesto Castro Moro.
tags: San Antonio de los Banos Air Base
title: DYVOUR/PBRUMEN/Operational: Photograph of "Comandante Willian"
locations_mentioned: San Antonio de los Banos Air Base
